nodes.text: The  Rainhawk-class transport, also known as the Pantoran cruiser, was a model of transport. Baron Notluwiski Papanoida, the Supreme Chairman of the Pantoran Assembly was known for owning one. The ship's design favored defense over offense, and was equipped with powerful ion engines and repulsorlift technology, allowing it to outmaneuver standard starfighters, yet not outpace them. The vessel was discontinued before the beginning of the Clone Wars.
